activities:
Lumos Labs, Inc. operates the Lumosity brand of cognitive training and related products, available at lumosity.com and via mobile applications (collectively, "Lumosity").  

Lumosity users may submit personal information, including their email address, as part of registering for various free products.  Users may submit further information in other situations, including, for example, if they decide to purchase paid subscriptions, contact Lumosity Customer Support, or participate in a survey. 

Personal information that is submitted is used as described in the privacy policy, including to operate the products, to contact users, to provide customer support and to authenticate logins.  It is shared with third parties as described in the privacy policy, including to third parties who assist the Company in providing its software products to customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
